## Post #2
- Username: shakotay2

- Post Title: Nightshade/Kunoichi (PS2) MLD models extract

no 'KFMG' section in PLAYER00.MLD so a tedious format analysis will be required which noone is supposed to do...
old Valkyria Chronicles script for blender:

```
start      size       type
Section 0
0x00000340 0x00000020 MLX0
Section 1
0x00000380 0x000001e8 MXTL
Section 2
0x00000580 0x0002d950 HMDL
```
